description: Interface to a format resolver. Different from IFormatResolver, IExplicitFormatResolver allow you to set "before style" and "after style". "After Style" can override the local computedFormat explicitly, which can be fetched by calling function resolveExplicitFormat(), "Before Style" is the format returned by function resolveFormat() defined in interface IFormatResolver.

members.description: Given a FlowElement or ContainerController object, return any explicit format settings for it.

values: format settings for the specified object.
